setup_script_description: sets focus on a link after the radio group
task: navigate to last unchecked radio button in group
specific_user_instruction: Navigate to the last radio button in the group. Note: You may need to press certain commands (such as Up Arrow) multiple times to hear all information relating to the radio button and group.
output_assertions: Name of the group, 'Pizza Crust', is conveyed
name of the radio button, 'Thin crust', is conveyed
State of the radio button, 'unchecked', is conveyed
Position of the radio button, 3, is conveyed
Number of radio buttons in the group, 3, is conveyed
